name: Cowryz – Woocommerce
author: Ifeanyi

sections.description:
This is Cowryz wallet payment gateway for WooCommerce. Allows you to use Cowryz wallet payment with the WooCommerce plugin.

Cowryz wallet payment gateway Needs Your Support

It is hard to continue development and support for this free plugin without contributions from users like you. If you enjoy using Cowryz wallet payment gateway and find it useful, then please rate it on wordpress. Your rating will help encourage and support the plugin’s continued development and better user support.

Configuration

  1. Visit the WooCommerce settings page, and click on the Payment Gateways tab.
  2. Click on Cowryz Wallet Payment to edit the settings. If you do not see Cowryz Wallet Payment in the list at the top of the screen make sure you have activated the plugin in the WordPress Plugin Manager.
  3. Enable the Payment Method, name it Cowryz Wallet Payment (this will show up on the payment page your customer sees), add in your merchant details and select redirect url(URL you want Cowryz Wallet Payment to redirect after payment). Click Save.
sections.installation:
1. Ensure you have latest version of WooCommerce plugin installed
  2. Unzip and upload contents of the plugin to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Do you have questions or issues with Cowryz wallet payment gateway? mail us on nilesh@omsoftware.net

Docs & Support

You can mail me your query on [nilesh@omsoftware.net] and I will get back to your with your answers.
